a.span: UPDATE: Important Message about School District Meeting MAY 13th

h2.font: Welcome to the Home of the Panthers!

br.font:
All schools in NH have moved to remote learning for the rest of the school year. April Vacation will still happen the week of April 27-May 1st.
​More information coming soon.

strong.font: Students - be sure to check your email and/or Google Classroom daily.

br.font: All school activities are cancelled until further notice.

div.font: To all of our students who we miss so much! Love, LRS teachers and staff sending positive vibes!

span.font: Senior and Sophomore Project Adaptation for COVID-19

h2.font: Great article for high school students adjusting to virtual schooling.
Many students use Google Classroom with their teachers. Click on the picture below for a great tutorial about how to use it.
For information about Warrant Articles and Tax Impact for this year's School Budget, please go to About LRS Tab and then School Board.

div.font:
October 9th - 9:30 -10:30 am performance for students in grades
K-6 with workshops following for students in grades 3-6.

a.span: NHPBS - Tiger Takes on Bullying Website

img.style: margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 10px; none; max-width:100%

span.style: display: table-caption; caption-side: bottom; font-size: 90%; margin-top: -10px; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

td.div:
Seniors - lots of new scholarship opportunities on the Guidance webpage under Faculty & Staff. Senior announcements are also shared with you through Google Drive from Mrs. Coleman. Check regularly for college,
armed services, graduation, and work force information.

br.br: ​Send in used cartridges, cell phones, laptops, PDA's, to help raise money for the school.

div.font:
COMING AGAIN THIS YEAR!
Popcorn Friday is the last Friday of the month
Popcorn is $1.00
Served at Snack Time (K-4)
Study Hall (5-8)
Sponsored by PALS

h2.font: Join PALS - Partners Assisting Lisbon Schools - see 'Parent' tab of this website for more information or join us on Facebook.

hr.div:
Thank you PALS for giving each student a Panther Paw to show school spirit.
PALS has more to sell for $3 each. Contact the office, Mrs. Woods, Mrs. Jesseman, or Mrs. Smith.

td.div: Learn about the changes that have been made to the assessment procedures at Lisbon Regional School.

td.div: The Parents Institute is education's #1 source of family involvement information. We encourage all parents to check out this monthly pamphlet for great information.

​the North Country

td.div: BGC is a great opportunity for kids and parents as an after-school program. Bus transportation from school is available.

div.br: The Facebook page is informational only and will have upcoming events and updated information throughout the year, including needed supplies for the start of school.

td.div: The Lisbon Lions' Club is a big supporter of the Lisbon, Lyman, Landaff, and Bath communities. Visit their page to see upcoming events and activities.

font.font: All information relating to the LRS Assessment Procedures are on its own page under About LRS tab or follow this link.

br.br: ​Powerschool Tutorials are now posted on the About LRS tab under Standards-Based Education or follow this link.
